description: Construction of a basement and ground floor rear and side extension.
decision_conditions: <p style="margin-bottom: 0px; font-stretch: normal; line-height: normal;">The proposed rear extension, by reason of its location/siting, and excessive depth would create a detrimental impact against the occupiers of the adjoining property at No.25 by virtue of overshadowing a basement window which serves a habitable room to their property, and general loss of outlook and an increase sense of enclosure and tunneling effect.</p><p style="margin-bottom: 0px; font-stretch: normal; line-height: normal;"><br></p><p style="margin-bottom: 0px; font-stretch: normal; line-height: normal;">Reason: The proposed development falls contrary to&nbsp;policies LP1 and LP2&nbsp;of the LP33 Hackney Local Plan 2020 and Policies 3.5 and 7.6 of the London Plan 2016 (as amended) and guidance&nbsp;contained within Hackney Council’s SPD on ‘Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document’ 2009 and ’NPPF’ 2019 (as amended).</p>

Insufficient information has been submitted on drainage given its location in a critical drainage area.  Given the expansive areas set to be developed and hard-surfaced, which in the absence of a drainage plan or SUDS detail/compliance the development poses a flood risk concern.


Reason: The proposed development falls contrary to policies LP53 of the LP33 Hackney Local Plan 2020 and Policy 5.13 of the London Plan 2016 (as amended) and guidance contained within the ’NPPF’ 2019 (as amended).

The proposed rear extension, by reason of its siting, design, scale and projected depth will significantly reduce the occupants private amenity areas and is therefore considered an overdevelopment of the site which will adversely impact on occupant amenities.


Reason: The proposed development falls contrary to policies LP1 and LP2 of the LP33 Hackney Local Plan 2020 and Policies 3.5 and 7.6 of the London Plan 2016 (as amended) and guidance contained within Hackney Council’s SPD on ‘Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document’ 2009 and ’NPPF’ 2019 (as amended).

<p style="margin-bottom: 0px; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 13px; line-height: normal; font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;;">The proposed development, by reason of its location/siting, and excessive depth would represents an incompatible addition to the detriment of the character and appearance of the host property and the general area.</p><p style="margin-bottom: 0px; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 13px; line-height: normal; font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;; min-height: 15px;"><br></p><p style="margin-bottom: 0px; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 13px; line-height: normal; font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;;">Reason: The proposed development falls contrary to policies LP1 and LP2 of the LP33 Hackney Local Plan 2020 and Policies 3.5 and 7.6 of the London Plan 2016 (as amended) and guidance contained within Hackney Council’s SPD on ‘Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document’ 2009 and ’NPPF’ 2019 (as amended).</p>
